headline: Is It Time to Give Up on Uber Stock?
summary: Uber stock sold off after its report as well as comments from Elon Musk.  Given its valuation, investors may look at Uber stock in a new light.  Shareholders in Uber Technologies (NYSE: UBER) may feel they are in a difficult position.

raw.headline: Is It Time to Give Up on Uber Stock?
raw.summary: Uber stock sold off after its report as well as comments from Elon Musk.  Given its valuation, investors may look at Uber stock in a new light.  Shareholders in Uber Technologies (NYSE: UBER) may feel they are in a difficult position.

headline: Nearly One-Third of Billionaire Bill Ackman's $11.9 Billion Portfolio Is Invested in These 3 Magnificent Growth Stocks
summary: Ackman's top new holding is Uber Technologies.  The billionaire also owns big positions in Alphabet Class A and Class C shares.  Uber's valuation seems iffy, but Alphabet appears to be poised to deliver solid growth.
